# Description

As project manager for the [ADAPT](https://projectadapt.nl/) project at ESSB, I coordinate the organizational aspects of the research project. The focus of my role is on project management, but I am also involved in data management and supporting processes (e.g., getting ERB approval, protecting personal data, etc.). In our day-to-day practices, we encourage collaboration and always seek to have maximum impact, but my knowledge about open science is not very extended. I am curious and very motivated to learn more about this.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot}

member_name <- "Claire Laudij-van Koot"
special_skill <- "project management"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "preregistration", "open access", all_of(special_skill), "data management", "data sharing", "open source software"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
